GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v6.0.2
GSD.description:
misc: pci_endpoint_test: Fix pci_endpoint_test_{copy,write,read}() panic

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.2 by commit 6c01739c2aba19553beb20491b05515af9246f0f, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 378f79cab12b669928f3a4037f023837ead2ce0c. For more details please see the references link.
